enucuzu.title: Enucuzu.com
enucuzu.details: A travel platform for booking flights, hotels, and rental cars. Backend was built with Go using microservices, Dockerized architecture, PostgreSQL for relational data, and Redis for caching/session management.

chatapp.title: ChatApp
chatapp.details: A real-time chat application developed with Node.js and WebSockets. Redis pub/sub used for scaling across multiple servers. Deployed on Kubernetes cluster for auto-scaling.
